mdRecord.dcterms:title: State of Virginia, Henry County, to-wit: I, John H. Pharis, a Notary Public in and for the county aforesaid, in the state of Virginia, do hereby certify that [blank] whose name [blank] signed to the foregoing and annexed writing, bearing date on the [blank] day of [blank] 18 [blank], this day personally appeared before me in my county aforesaid, and acknowledged the said writing to be [blank] act and deed. Given under my hand this [blank] day of [blank] 18 [blank] N.P.
I, John H. Pharis, a Notary Public in and for the county aforesaid, in the state of Virginia, do hereby certify that
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two-part form printed on a single sheet; seal of the Commonwealth of Virginia on a background of a surveyor at Natural Bridge, in upper left.

Second part of form reads as follows: State of Virginia, Henry County, to-wit: I, John H. Pharis, a notary public in and for the county aforesaid, in the state of Virginia, do hereby certify that [blank] wife of [blank] whose names are signed to the writing hereunto annexed, bearing date on the [blank] day of [blank] 18 [blank], this day personally appeared before me in writing in my county aforesaid, and being examined by me privily and apart from [blank] husband, and having the writing aforesaid fully explained to [blank] the said [blank] acknowledged the said writing to be [blank] act and deed, and declared that [blank] had willingly executed the same, and do [blank] wish to retract it. Given under my hand this [blank] day of [blank] 18 [blank] N.P.
Blank form, printed on yellow paper.
